vote.title: Appointment of Brian J. Ellis, President & COO, Nationwide Realty Investors, 375 N. Front Street, Suite 200, Columbus, OH 43215-2220, to serve on the Franklin County Convention Facilities Authority Board of Directors, replacing Brian Ross, with a term expiration date of August 17, 2026. (biography attached).
